name: WindowStyle
desc: A specification for the appearance and interaction of a window.

items.name: static var hiddenTitleBar: HiddenTitleBarWindowStyle
items.desc: A window style which hides both the window’s title and the backing of the titlebar area, allowing more of the window’s content to show.

items.name: static var titleBar: TitleBarWindowStyle
items.desc: A window style which displays the title bar section of the window.

items.name: struct HiddenTitleBarWindowStyle
items.desc: A window style which hides both the window’s title and the backing of the titlebar area, allowing more of the window’s content to show.

items.name: struct TitleBarWindowStyle
items.desc: A window style which displays the title bar section of the window.
